response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This unique offering is not just a product; it's an investment in innovation and quality. Given its exceptional features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $15,000. Considering its unparalleled benefits, I am extending you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $18,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I look forward to discussing how this product can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Please let me know if you have any questions or require additional information.", "product_price": 18000}
